name: Bulletin
description:
For the best experience please install the game if you don't want to install the game you can play the web version

Bulletin is a game made for the brackeys game jam 2023.1

Big Thanks to the Brackeys Team For Organizing this event!
Big Thanks to everyone in the brackeys discord for helping me with my problems and keeping me motivated

Big Thanks to my friend Maxi (I kinda stole his name)

Please leave feedback on your experience! it is greatly appreciated 

Music:
Eric Skiff - Underclocked - Resistor Anthems
Eric Skiff - Prologue- Resistor Anthems
Eric Skiff - We're The Resistors- Resistor Anthems
Eric Skiff - Come and Find Me- Resistor Anthems
Eric Skiff - Searching- Resistor Anthems
 All Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music


 I have left some of the previous versions of the game up so you can see the progress i made in a week!
